summary: Completed testing of WooCommerce integration features for F&F tokens and merchandise. All 16 backend tests passed. Frontend pages (Homepage, MerchandisePage, MyAccountPage) load correctly without errors. WooCommerce integration is LIVE (not mocked) using finandfeathersrestaurants.com store.
critical_code_review_comments: WooCommerce integration is LIVE using real finandfeathersrestaurants.com store - NOT MOCKED
Cart checkout and token checkout both create WooCommerce orders with proper meta_data for tracking
Webhook endpoint handles WooCommerce order status updates and credits tokens appropriately
BaseModel import was fixed in server.py for CartItem and CartCheckoutRequest classes
MyAccountPage correctly uses transaction_id (not sessionId) for payment return handling
seed_data_creation: Created test user profile via API for account page testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: WooCommerce integration is LIVE (not mocked). Token packages at /api/tokens/packages return 5 packages. Merchandise at /api/merchandise returns 8 products from WooCommerce. Cart checkout creates WooCommerce orders. MyAccountPage payment return uses transaction_id parameter.

mocked_apis.note: WooCommerce API is real - connects to finandfeathersrestaurants.com store

GET /api/merchandise.details: Returns 8 products from WooCommerce with id, name, price, image, categories

POST /api/cart/checkout.details: Creates WooCommerce order for cart items. Empty cart returns 400 error correctly

POST /api/tokens/checkout.details: Creates WooCommerce order for token purchase. Invalid package returns 400, invalid user returns 404

POST /api/webhook/woocommerce.details: Handles WooCommerce webhooks for order status updates. Credits tokens for completed orders

GET /api/cart/order/{order_id}.details: Returns order status. Invalid order_id returns 404

GET /api/tokens/checkout/status/{transac.details: Returns checkout status. Invalid transaction_id returns 404

Homepage.details: Loads correctly with logo, welcome modal, Merch Shop button

MerchandisePage /merch.details: Displays 8 products with images, prices ($19.25), Add to Cart buttons. Cart sidebar works with quantity controls and checkout button

MyAccountPage /account.details: Shows profile info, Tokens tab with 5 packages, token balance, purchase button. Correctly shows 'Create Profile' for new users
